name = #{name},
memo = #{memo},
guider = #{guider},

SELECT m.id , m.name , m.guider , m.depart_id , m.team_id , at.group_id as at_group_id , g.g_name as g_g_name , g.ord as g_ord , at.group_grade as at_group_grade , m.date_of_birth , m.htel , m.gender , m.member_reg_date , m.member_grad_date , m.same_period_id , m.origin_profile_img , m.replace_profile_img , m.reg_user , m.reg_date , m.mod_date , m.mem_state , m.del_yn , d.d_name as d_d_name , t.id as t_id , t.t_short_name as t_t_short_name , g.id as g_id , sp.birth_year as sp_birth_year FROM member m LEFT OUTER JOIN attendance_${year} at ON at.member_id = m.id LEFT OUTER JOIN depart d ON d.id = m.depart_id LEFT OUTER JOIN team t ON t.id = m.team_id LEFT OUTER JOIN `group` g ON g.id = at.group_id LEFT OUTER JOIN same_period sp ON sp.id = m.same_period_id WHERE 1=1
AND t.id = #{teamId}
AND (t.id = '4' or t.id = '8')
AND m.del_yn = 'N' AND m.mem_state NOT IN ('5', '6')
AND at.month BETWEEN 1 and 6
AND at.month BETWEEN 7 and 12
AND at.month BETWEEN 10 and 12
GROUP BY at.member_id ORDER BY t.id ASC , FIELD(at.group_id, #{id}) DESC , at.group_id DESC , at.group_grade DESC , g.ord ASC , g.g_name ASC , m.name ASC

SELECT m.name , at.group_id as at_group_id FROM member m LEFT OUTER JOIN attendance_${year} at ON at.member_id = m.id LEFT OUTER JOIN `group` g ON g.id = at.group_id WHERE 1=1 AND m.del_yn = 'N' AND m.mem_state NOT IN ('5') AND at.group_grade = '순장' AND g.season_flag = #{seasonFlag} GROUP BY m.id ORDER BY m.name ASC

SELECT m.id , m.name , m.guider , m.depart_id , m.team_id , m.date_of_birth , m.htel , m.gender , m.member_reg_date , m.member_grad_date , m.same_period_id , m.origin_profile_img , m.replace_profile_img , m.reg_user , m.reg_date , m.mod_date , m.mem_state , m.del_yn , d.d_name as d_d_name , t.t_short_name as t_t_short_name , sp.birth_year as sp_birth_year FROM member m LEFT OUTER JOIN depart d ON d.id = m.depart_id LEFT OUTER JOIN team t ON t.id = m.team_id LEFT OUTER JOIN same_period sp ON sp.id = m.same_period_id WHERE 1=1 AND m.del_yn = 'N' AND m.mem_state NOT IN ('5', '6') ORDER BY FIELD(sp.id, #{sId}) DESC , d.d_name ASC , FIELD(t.t_short_name, '새가족') ASC , FIELD(SUBSTRING(t.t_short_name, 2), '새가족') ASC , FIELD(t.t_short_name, '기쁨') ASC , t.t_short_name ASC , m.name ASC

SELECT m.id , m.name , m.guider , m.depart_id , m.team_id , m.date_of_birth , m.htel , m.gender , m.member_reg_date , m.member_grad_date , m.same_period_id , m.origin_profile_img , m.replace_profile_img , m.reg_user , m.reg_date , m.mod_date , m.mem_state , m.del_yn , d.d_name as d_d_name , t.t_short_name as t_t_short_name , sp.birth_year as sp_birth_year FROM member m LEFT OUTER JOIN depart d ON d.id = m.depart_id LEFT OUTER JOIN team t ON t.id = m.team_id LEFT OUTER JOIN same_period sp ON sp.id = m.same_period_id WHERE 1=1 AND m.same_period_id = #{sId} AND m.del_yn = 'N' AND m.mem_state NOT IN ('5', '6') ORDER BY d.d_name ASC , FIELD(t.t_short_name, '새가족') ASC , FIELD(SUBSTRING(t.t_short_name, 2), '새가족') ASC , FIELD(t.t_short_name, '기쁨') ASC , t.t_short_name ASC , m.name ASC

SELECT m.id , m.name , m.memo , m.guider , m.depart_id , m.team_id , m.date_of_birth , m.htel , m.gender , m.same_period_id , m.mem_state , m.origin_profile_img , m.replace_profile_img , m.member_reg_date , m.member_grad_date FROM member m WHERE 1=1 AND m.id = #{id} AND m.del_yn = 'N'

SELECT m.id , m.name , m.memo , m.guider , m.depart_id , m.team_id , m.date_of_birth , m.htel , m.gender , m.same_period_id , m.mem_state , m.origin_profile_img , m.replace_profile_img , m.member_reg_date , m.member_grad_date , sp.birth_year as sp_birth_year FROM member m LEFT OUTER JOIN same_period sp ON sp.id = m.same_period_id WHERE 1=1 AND m.name = #{name} AND m.del_yn = 'N' AND ( m.depart_id = 1
AND (date_format(now(), '%Y') - sp.birth_year) > 25
OR (m.team_id = 4 OR m.team_id = 8) )

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT at.id FROM attendance_${year} at LEFT OUTER JOIN member m ON m.id = at.member_id WHERE 1=1 AND at.group_id = #{id} AND m.del_yn = 'N' AND m.mem_state NOT IN ('5', '6') GROUP BY at.member_id ) a
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT id FROM member m WHERE 1=1 AND m.same_period_id = #{id} AND m.del_yn = 'N' AND m.mem_state NOT IN ('5', '6') ) a

SELECT m.id , at.group_id , t.t_short_name as t_t_short_name , g.g_name as g_g_name , m.name , m.mem_state , ms.m_state as ms_m_state , m.same_period_id , sp.birth_year as sp_birth_year , m.htel FROM member m LEFT OUTER JOIN team t ON t.id = m.team_id LEFT OUTER JOIN same_period sp ON sp.id = m.same_period_id LEFT OUTER JOIN attendance_${year} at ON at.member_id = m.id LEFT OUTER JOIN `group` g ON g.id = at.group_id LEFT OUTER JOIN member_state ms ON ms.id = m.mem_state WHERE at.month = 8 AND m.mem_state != 5 AND m.mem_state != 6 AND m.del_yn = 'N' GROUP BY m.id ORDER BY FIELD(t.t_short_name, '새가족') ASC , m.depart_id ASC , t.id ASC , g.g_name ASC , m.mem_state ASC , m.name ASC

SELECT m.id , m.name , m.guider , m.depart_id , m.team_id , m.date_of_birth , m.htel , m.gender , m.member_reg_date , m.member_grad_date , m.same_period_id , m.origin_profile_img , m.replace_profile_img , m.reg_user , m.reg_date , m.mod_date , m.mem_state , m.mem_state_date , m.del_yn , m.del_date , d.d_name as d_d_name , t.t_short_name as t_t_short_name , sp.birth_year as sp_birth_year FROM member m LEFT OUTER JOIN depart d ON d.id = m.depart_id LEFT OUTER JOIN team t ON t.id = m.team_id LEFT OUTER JOIN same_period sp ON sp.id = m.same_period_id WHERE 1=1
AND m.del_yn = 'Y'
AND m.mem_state = '6'
AND m.mem_state = '5'
AND m.name LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{nameKW}, '%')
ORDER BY m.depart_id ASC , FIELD(t.t_short_name, '동산','등대','언약', '기쁨', '열공', '은행', '정감', '새가족') ASC , FIELD(t.t_full_name, '2청년부 새가족팀','1청년부 새가족팀') DESC , m.name ASC
